title: Watch live: House committee holds hearing on global terrorism
text:
The House Homeland Security Committee on Wednesday will hold a hearing with acting Secretary of Homeland Security Kevin K. McAleenan, FBI director Christopher Wray and Russell Travers, acting Director of the National Counterterrorism Center.

ADVERTISEMENT

The hearing comes days after President Trump announced ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi's death on Sunday from the White House.

The president was criticized for keeping key lawmakers in the dark ahead of the raid that killed al-Baghdadi.

The hearing is scheduled for 10 a.m.

Watch live in the video above.
